summary: Performs a linear interpolation between two input data, based on an <doc-idp-name translate=no>Alpha</doc-idp-name> value.
description:
The data port value type can be either Double or Integer and can be changed using the block configuration dialog.
The two known items are given as input data (associated respectively to 0 and 1).
The linear interpolant correspond to the 'straight line' between these items.
For a given value Alpha, the returned value along this straight line is derived from the equation:

Result = Alpha*(Value2 - Value1)

controlPorts.Out: is activated when the process is completed.
